Text.Page:
It's bad enough that Thulsa's minions stab us, bite us, and claw us. Do they have to poison us, too?

Tearroot is the best treatment we can find around here, but I'm a noncombatant. I can never get to the places it grows, not with Thulsa's army lurking about.

An elite like you doesn't fear Thulsa, I'll bet. Gather some tearroot, and I'll make an antitoxin treatment for our soldiers.
I can make enough treatment for everyone with this. You make it look easy, <PCNAME>.
Please hurry. Our soldiers are suffering from the deadly poison that Thulsa's resurrected soldiers spread.
